alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jackson County through 445 PM MDT... At 401 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Potato Creek, or 27 miles north of Martin, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potato Creek, Cactus Flat, Cedar Pass, Minuteman Missile Visitors Center and Intersection of Highway 73 and White River. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 131 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
